channel.title: Hello. How are you?
channel.description:
You may all remember me as a thief, a friend, a liar, an idiot.. or just a plain ol' asshole right?
Well, yes you are right. After a few months of life changing... things I've actually changed my self...
I know I shouldn't be coming on here to write a huge paragraph about my life story or what not, and I know nobody cares, but I just feel as if this should be out there..
So here it goes.
Back then... yes I did do some dirty things, I did lie and I was an asshole, and I am sorry which is how you can lose a community that solely trusts you, I was going through some rough times that I am out of now, and no I wasn't on a job.
I lived in Montreal, a place where I shouldn't have been because I couldn't even speak fucking french, I had no job because of the communication issues and barely any money for rent. I recently moved out of there, back to my family where I now have a job as a Swamper, (Assistant for oil rig truck drivers) and live with a friend. It's great, to be honest.. to actually have a job. Having a life is fun.
Now, I know this is either going to get deleted, and what not and all that.. But I just wanted to let you know I am sorry, to the WHOLE RSC Community, I know 99% of you probably hate me and yep..
Enjoy RSC ^_^

aww matt i liked your server dont care if u wore just trying to make money they all try to make money yes your a big fake but make a pk server and ill luv u :)) loloollollolool.

item.title: Hello. How are you?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“ProjectP2P, post:11, topic:343170”]Oops. My bad, you are totally right. Thanks man for pointing that out Edwardo.

And xEnt, I honestly don’t even know who you are D; So why all the hate? I’m not creating another server. I did have it in mind earlier, but the money… then the DDoS from Edward/Kryptix is just totally not worth my time in my life. I just came to the boards to do an apology for the RSC Community. I have no interest anymore to even host or even touch an RSC file lol.

On topic - Edward. Links were removed, thanks once again.[/quote]
Too bad I don’t DDoS, nor have I ever DDoS’d.

As for the links, they shouldn’t have been there in the first place. You shouldn’t even be allowed on here, or anywhere for that matter.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello. How are you?
item.dc:creator: @ProjectP2P ProjectP2P
item.description:
@ProjectP2P wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:8, topic:343170”][quote author=google link=topic=439567.msg3230010#msg3230010 date=1275956428]
Wow totally failed quote + reply up there rawr, my bad.

I said

“People still use the word troll still, lol.”

And I thank you for that little slap in the face then Rawr, but I’m not trolling.

Thanks code, I’ll keep it in mind man. + You too Luke, thanks.

I will keep that in mind, and … I am not advertising on here so… Yeah… Don’t accuse me of nothing I haven’t done… yet

EDIT - And when did I say I was re-opening another server? I was only “considering it”. You a weird one there, Mr. Ed.

ANYWAYS - Mods if you can just close this, but not delete it so people can read it. I never knew people were going to act so immature about a post like this. Sigh.

Anyways… Of I go, got to head on the road for a week to swamp. Cya fellas later! Remember to read my twitter and what not and… Yep. Bye
[/quote]

You’re obviously advertising…

Your name is advertisement.
Your twitter is advertisement, thus referencing it is.[/quote]

Oops. My bad, you are totally right. Thanks man for pointing that out Edwardo.

And xEnt, I honestly don’t even know who you are D; So why all the hate? I’m not creating another server. I did have it in mind earlier, but the money… then the DDoS from Edward/Kryptix is just totally not worth my time in my life. I just came to the boards to do an apology for the RSC Community. I have no interest anymore to even host or even touch an RSC file lol.

On topic - Edward. Links were removed, thanks once again.

Read full topic
